data.title: Emergency proclamation
data.excerpt: Governor Newsom proclaims a drought emergency. This lets the state prepare and respond to drought in the Russian River Watershed of Sonoma and Mendocino counties.
data.author: Admin

site_settings.site_description: Learn more about current conditions, the stateâ€™s response and informational resources available to the public.
